---
title: "Data visualization"
---
    
There should be some data visualization here.   
```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("readr")
library("ggplot2")
test <- read_csv("test.csv")
test
test1 <- test$Date
test2 <- test$`Number of infected`
ggplot(data = test, aes(x = test1, y = test2)) + 
  geom_bar(stat = "identity",fill="purple") +
  labs(title = "Todal daily vaccinated",
           substitute = "2021",
           x = "Date", y = "Vaccinated infected (day)")
```
